testcase.name: 1.7.(b) - Implication of no facts for an indicated template
testcase.description: An instance document MUST NOT include positive filing indicator elements indicating a reporting unit ("template") as filed (i.e. @find:filed="true", or no @find:filed attribute) for reporting units which are NOT intended to be reported in the instance.

variation.description: XBRL instance with filing indicators identifying templates for which at least one fact is reported.
XBRL instance with a filing indicator identifying a template (without find:filed="true") for which no facts are reported.
XBRL instance with a filing indicator identifying a template (with find:filed="true") for which no facts are reported.
